paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on BRCA2 variants and penetrance data from the study.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: One of the two patients carried the BRCA2 gene mutation 932insA.

functional_data.summary: The BRCA2 mutation is associated with a high risk of breast cancer.

variants.additional_notes: The variant is part of a study focusing on hereditary breast carcinoma.
key_quotes: All 47 patients with HBC were less than 40 years old and had a germline mutation in a BRCA gene; 25 in the BRCA1 gene and 22 in the BRCA2 gene.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward with clear identification of the BRCA2 variant.
